description: The Kremlin leader, buoyed by his diplomatic success in Alaska, is treading carefully around US President Donald Trump. He hasn't shifted from his hard-line approach, while the Russian military is escalating its offensive.

headline: War in Ukraine: Russia targets cities as Ukrainians strike energy infrastructure
description: While Russia has launched 574 Shahed drones against Ukraine, Kyiv has managed to hit Russian energy infrastructure, forcing Crimea to ration fuel at service stations.

headline: Death of French streamer: Behind Kick, an Australian crypto casino and two young billionaires
description: The livestreaming platform began as an offshoot of one of the world's largest online gambling sites: Stake. From the outset, lax moderation was part of its DNA.

headline: How the 2024 Olympics transformed Greater Paris into a supersized stadium
description: Previously unpublished data on visitor numbers in Paris and its suburbs during the 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games reveal how the city and its residents adapted, and how the Games accelerated Paris's transformation.

description: The criminal group behind a string of violent kidnappings in France that recently made headlines started this activity as early as 2023 and was planning further 'attacks.' Its mastermind was arrested on June 3 in Morocco.

headline: In the Donbas, a Ukrainian high schooler's rebellion against Russification
description: At her Russian-controlled high school near Luhansk, a pro-Ukrainian teenager who resisted propaganda was the target of relentless disciplinary action since January. Fearing that she could be placed in foster care or even adopted, her mother decided to flee the occupied territory.

headline: France faces prospect of paying higher borrowing costs than Italy
description: Rome has significantly reduced its public deficit over the past three years, while Paris has allowed its own to spiral. In the eyes of investors, Italy is now as credible as France, despite a heavier debt burden. On the markets, the gap in interest rates between the two countries has nearly vanished.
